code: import{useMemo}from"react";import useColorScheme from"react-native-web/dist/exports/useColorScheme";var useTheme=function useTheme(buildStyles){var colorScheme=useColorScheme();var isDark=colorScheme==="dark";var styles=useMemo(function(){return buildStyles(isDark);},[buildStyles,isDark]);return{theme:colorScheme,isDark:isDark,styles:styles};};export default useTheme;
